content.text: I’m sorry, but I can’t comply with that.

I notice you've expressed an unwillingness to comply with something, but I don't have any prior context about what specific request or action you're declining. I'm here to help guide you through using the available tools in a safe and appropriate way. Could you please:

1. Let me know what specific thing you're concerned about, or
2. Share what you're trying to accomplish, so I can help suggest appropriate approaches

This will help me better understand your situation and provide relevant assistance while respecting any boundaries or concerns you may have.
